Name: Alexa Gutiérrez
Description:
Alexa was stabbed and beaten to death inside her home. Her sister found her body several days after she had been killed.

Alexa was a stylist who was in the early stages of transition and was fighting cancer at the same time. She was well known in the area and visited local communities to offer free haircuts to people who could not afford to pay for her services.

> Marco Antonio García Robles, president of the VIDHA AC Foundation, demanded that the Prosecutor's Office investigate the killing of Alexa Gutiérrez as feminicide, since she was a transgender person.
> 
> "We do not exist and that is unfair. We demand that this be investigated as such, that they begin to take the protocol because it is not fair that they hide us, we must begin to demand, because trans individuals do exist ".
> 
> For their part, family members said that in recent times she was fighting for her life, so at the time Alexa decided that her identity change was not urgent, but that this is not a reason for her murder not to be investigated as feminicide.

Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & desastre, 26.05.2017

https://www.elsoldelcentro.com.mx/policiaca/asesinan-a-persona-transgenero-1794931.html

http://aguasdigital.com/metro/leer.php?idnota=73695&t=l

https://metropolitanoags.blogspot.com/2018/06/asesinan-geovanny-gutierrez-conocido.html
Tweet:
Alexa Gutiérrez was stabbed and beaten in Jesús Maria, Aguascalientes (Mexico) on 2 Jul 2018.

Alexa was a stylist who was in the early stages of transition and was fighting cancer at the same time. She was 47. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR

Name: Daine Grey
Description:
Daine died by suicide. His parents disowned him and refused to claim his body.

A Gofundme page was set up to cover funeral expenses and raised over $17,000 in less than 40 hours.

https://www.pinknews.co.uk/2018/07/18/trans-student-funeral-fundraiser-parents-refuse-claim-body/

> Daine passed away on 7/2. Daine’s parents are refusing to claim his body because he is trans. If you can help donate to give him a funeral that would be appreciated. He deserves a beautiful ceremony. Please RT.

> On 7/2/18 Daine Grey 22 yo trans queer student from CCSF, took his life. His parents disowned him; according to the coroner still hasn't responded to their calls to come claim his body. We need the greater community to help fund Daine’s burial expenses."

https://www.pinknews.co.uk/2018/07/19/daine-grey-funeral-lady-katerina-gofundme-blown-away-money-parents/

> The friend who organised a crowdfunder to pay for the funeral of trans student Daine Grey, who is believed to have taken his own life, has spoken to PinkNews about the outpouring of the love and support the campaign has received – smashing its $17,000 target in just 40 hours.
> 
> “If you look at the picture that I posted (above), I took that picture, that basically sums [him] up. He was proud of who he was,” Lady Katerina tells PinkNews from San Francisco.
>
> “Even though he struggled with depression, even though he struggled with physical disabilities and other health problems, he was just trying to make life better for himself.”
> 
> The community leader is talking about the photo of Grey,  happily posing with a Pride flag, which she used on the GoFundMe page she set up to fundraise enough money to pay for his funeral. She says that she took the photo because it was his “Supergay Daine Day.”

https://www.facebook.com/citycollegeofsanfrancisco/posts/10155882819184755

https://twitter.com/feministpowp…/status/1019364834662498305

https://twitter.com/PrincetcnAve/status/1019284813025439744

https://www.gofundme.com/final-dignity-for-daine
Tweet:
Daine Grey died by suicide in San Francisco, California (USA) on 2 Jul 2018. His parents disowned him and refused to claim his body.

He was 22. #SayHisName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR

Name: Deepa
Description:
Deepa was stabbed to death. Although she had been attacked before, this time it proved fatal.

> Deepak Rana, chairperson of the NGO, said this was the third attack on Deepa.
> 
> “Last September, she was picked up by some youths and after raping her, they chopped off her hand. She was so traumatised with the incident that she could not even recalled the incident to lodge a police complaint,” said Rana.
> 
> The community has also accused a policeman of harassing Deepa to seek sexual favour for him and his friends. “It was only after we raised the issue with senior police officials that the accused police man stopped harassing her”.

Asia Pacific Transgender Network & Tribune India, 04.07.2018

https://www.tribuneindia.com/news/jalandhar/transgender-beaten-to-death/614908.html
Tweet: Deepa was beaten and stabbed in Jalandhar, Punjab (India) on 3 Jul 2018. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR

Name: Mirela da Silva Soares
Description:
Mirela's body was found on the afternoon of 4th July beneath a pile of debris in a vacant lot adjacent to a repair shop.

She had cuts on her neck and had been strangled with the strap of a handbag. Investigators believe that she may have been killed by a client at the end of their meeting.

In November 2019 a man was arrested for her murder.

> The Balneário Camboriú DIC arrested 35-year-old ES on charges of murdering the [trans woman] Myrela in July last year. The arrest was on Friday.
>
> The victim was found dead in a vacant lot on Alvin Bauer Avenue, next to a mechanic's shop downtown, on July 4, 2018. The body was under furniture scraps. Myrela was strangled with a purse strap and had neck cuts.
>
> Civil police investigations indicate that E. and Mirela, after drinking and using drugs, had sex. The two would have had a disagreement and E. killed the [trans woman].
>
> Last Thursday, the police arrived at the suspect and during the interrogation he confessed to the crime. Police requested E.'s probation the same day, but were not granted justice until the next day. The suspect is in Canhanduba jail.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/rKfSeLza3t0" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Name: Fernanda da Biz
Description:
Fernanda was hit over the head several times and stabbed more than 20 times. Her head was crushed and her face torn.

Police believe that her killing took place between midnight and 1 am.

> FERNANDA DA BIZ, A CRIME OF HATE! 
> SOMEBODY CARES?
> 
> Few people will pay attention to the cruel way in which they took the life of Fernanda, her death will only become one more factor in addition to the index of murders of LGBTs in Brazil.
> 
> I remember that in some conversations with Fernanda, who was present in all sessions of the Chamber, she showed concern for the growing culture of prejudice, of which she and several LGBTS were victims in the city. 
> I remember that in the vote on the Law that instituted the Municipal Day to Combat Homophobia, Fernanda was present as living proof of this prejudice.
> 
> Today, unfortunately, it is definitive proof of this sense of aversion and hatred that we need to banish from our relationships with other human beings, homophobia!
> 
> Fernanda, go in peace!

Her Facebook profiles are https://www.facebook.com/fernanda.dabiz.50 and https://www.facebook.com/fernanda.dabiz.

IBTE & Campo Grande News, 08.07.2018

Subsequently Alessandro dos Santos Barbosa was arrested for her murder.

Name: Adri Adelý Jurado
Description:
Adri was stabbed in the abdomen with a kitchen knife by a client who came to the establishment where she worked with other sex workers on 12 de Octubre Avenue.

Yamil Careaga Blanco, 22, was arrested at the scene. Her murder is being treated as femicide as Adri carried identity documents congruent with her identity.

> The man stabbed the night worker after realizing she was transsexual, said Lily Cortez, leader of the Bolivian Night Workers Organization (OTN-B). The representative regretted that the aggressor had let out his transphobia against the worker, which is why her organization will take legal action as plaintiffs.
> 
> "We regret this transphobia. Although she is trans, for us, the sex workers, she is a lady, she is a woman and nobody has the right to take her life. We as an organization will constitute ourselves as a complainant" she said.

Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & La Razon, 13.07.2018

Name: Simge Avcı
Description:
Simge was shot in the stomach by her boyfriend at her home in the Ilkadim district. He defended his actions by claiming that she had "mocked his manhood".

He has been arrested for her killing.

> Simge Avcı loved practical jokes, says her roommate Bahar, recalling how her friend would giggle after pretending to spill the contents of an empty teapot on her startled victims.
> 
> Bahar (not her real name), 25, had lived with Avcı for seven years in Samsun, a small, sleepy city on the Black Sea coast of Turkey.
> 
> On 13 July, the roommates went out for a long breakfast with Avcı’s boyfriend, Mecit Sezer, and her mother. They chatted as they ate and later went to a local pool to combat the sweltering heat. “It was a normal day,” says Bahar.
> 
> The group parted company at about 7pm. Less than five hours later, Avcı was shot in the stomach and died.

Pembehayat and The Guardian, 16.08.2018

https://www.theguardian.com/global-development/2018/aug/16/she-insulted-my-manhood-turkey-faces-fresh-scrutiny-lgbt-rights

Name: Aisha Albuquerque
Description:
Aisha was beaten to death inside an abandoned house  late on the morning of Friday 13th July. She was found by neighbours after they heard an argument and cries for help.

According to the Civil Police, the crime scene is an abandoned house used by drug users.

> A 26-year-old [trans woman] identified only by the nickname “ Aisha ”, was beaten to death this Friday morning (13). The situation happened around 10 am, in a “mocó” located on Rua Simão Kossobudski, in the Boqueirão neighborhood of Curitiba.
> 
> According to police chief Osmar Feijó , from the Civil Police's Homicide and Protection Division (DHPP), the hypothesis is that the victim suffered aggression as a result of negotiations involving drugs.

Her Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100009692860332.

IBTE & Banda B, 13.07.2018

Name: Chanel
Description:
Chanel was shot dead at midnight on Sunday 15th July by unknown assailants while working on Alexander Von Humboldt Avenue. She died in an ambulance on the way to hospital.

In April 2019 Juan Carlos Tarango, 37, was sentenced to spend 47 years and 6 months in prison for her murder.

> After six months of trial, Juan Carlos Tarango, 37 years old, was sentenced to spend 47 years and 6 months in the Santiaguito prison in Almoloya de Juárez for the murder of Chanel, recorded in the capital of the State of Mexico. . 
> 
> The sentence was imposed by Judge Rubén, attached to the Toluca District Courts adjacent to the Almoloya de Juárez prison under case 59/2019, which also established a reparation of the damage for 194 thousand pesos to the relatives of the murdered victim. 

Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & El Grafico, 21.07.2018

Name: Lay Neves de Santana
Description:
Lay was shot in the chest early on Monday 16th July during an attempted robbery by two men on a motorcycle. She died in hospital.

> A [trans woman] identified only as “LAY” was shot dead on Monday night (16), in the Parque Verde II neighborhood, in Camaçari. 
> 
> According to information from a friend of the victim who was at the time of the crime they were going to the "RUA", when two men aboard a motorcycle stopped and asked for Lay's bag. When Lay refused one of the criminals fired a single shot at the chest of the victim. She died before receiving care at the HGC where she had been taken by a police car.
> 
> The crime took place on TV Almirante tamandaré near the embasa.

IBTE & Conexao cidade, 17.07.2018

Name: Sasha Garden
Description:
Sasha's body was found naked behind an apartment complex on th19 Jul 2018.

Investigators have not said how she was killed, only that there was trauma to her body.

http://www.orlandosentinel.com/news/breaking-news/os-sasha-garden-vigil-20180721-story.html

> Although Christine Dance never met Sasha Garden, she felt compelled to join a small candlelight vigil to honor the woman who was found dead at an Orlando apartment complex Thursday morning.
> 
> “She was a woman,” Dance said of Garden. “She was a woman of color. She was a trans woman of color. Out of all the tough identities to have, a trans woman of color is the most dangerous.”
> 
> Dance joined about 15 other people at Lake Eola on Saturday evening to honor Garden’s life. The group prayed together. They held up signs adorned with pictures of Garden’s name and face. And they gathered to remember several other transgender women of color who have died this year — Garden’s death being the fourth in Florida, according to the advocacy group Equality Florida.

The Advocate and WFTV, 23.07.2018

https://www.lgbtqnation.com/2018/07/transgender-woman-found-dead-orlando-media-insulted/

http://www.pghlesbian.com/2018/07/sasha-garden-27-is-the-15th-trans-person-murdered-in-the-us-during-2018/

https://www.wftv.com/news/local/body-found-outside-apartment-complex-near-orange-blossom-trail-deputies-say/793299212

https://www.news965.com/news/local/deputies-confirm-transgender-woman-found-dead-behind-orange-county-apartment-building/T6dXECCHiIauTtinzZ2JJM/

http://www.wesh.com/article/man-wearing-wig-dressed-as-woman-found-dead/22437693
Tweet:
Sasha Garden was killed in Orlando, Florida (USA) on 19 Jul 2018. Her naked body was found behind an apartment complex.

She was 27. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR

Name: Sania
Description:
Sania was shot dead at a wedding in the Chiniya Nawali area of Hafizabad on Friday 20th July.

She was one of several trans women engaged as dancers at a wedding party. When one of the guests made unwelcome sexual advances and the group objected, he pulled a gun and shot Sania dead.

> Transgender persons are often targeted and denied their rights in Pakistan’s deeply patriarchal society. Dancing at weddings and stage performances are the most common professions that the marginalised community’s members take up. In Pakistan, stage performers have little protection. In April this year, pregnant singer Samina Sindhu was shot dead for being unable to dance while singing. Transgender performers face even worse discrimination. Aish Khan, a transgender performer based in Karachi, told SAMAA that men get drunk at most of the functions.
> 
> “I used to perform at all-men gatherings but have stopped that because I have been assaulted four times,” she said. “The men consider us their private property and do not respect our choices. Now, I just perform at family functions.”
> 
> Performers are ill-treated if they say no. “Men at a DHA event shaved the eyebrows of my friend, Payal, just to humiliate her,” she said. “Our community protested and the police arrested him, only to let him off in a few hours. I saw him again at a function in Baldia and he asked me to meet him alone. When I said no, he told me that he’ll kidnap me on my way.”
> 
> Aish said men do not consider them humans. “We are humans and we get tired after continuous performance from 12am to 5am,” she said. “If I want to sit and rest for a while, they get furious.”

Geo.tv & Daily Pakistan, 20.07.2018

http://planettransgender.com/pakistani-transgender-wedding-dancer-sania-murdered-while-performing/

Name: Alexa Martinez
Description:
Alexa was murdered on the morning of Sunday 22nd July after attending a concert. Her death was caused by trauma to the head.

According to witnesses, on Saturday night she had left her house with friends to go to a Pancho Barraza concert held at the Silao Fair 2018 (http://fiestasmexicanas.info/feria-de-silao-2018/). She was last seen at dawn on Sunday in the downtown area of the city.

Her body was found the next day by municipal police officers alongside the Silao-Guanajuato highway.

Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & desastre, 25.07.2018

http://zonafranca.mx/silao-tras-acudir-a-baile-joven-transexual-es-asesinado-lo-encuentran-a-un-costado-de-la-salida-a-guanajuato-capital/

http://desastre.mx/mexico/joven-mujer-trans-es-asesinada-en-guanajuato/

https://elotroenfoque.mx/pide-colectivo-investigar-homofobia-por-homicidios-de-jovenes/

https://www.facebook.com/groups/229267187268558/permalink/937409616454308/
Tweet: Alexa Martinez was beaten to death after attending a concert in Silao, Guanajuato (Mexico) on 22 Jul 2018.

Name: M. L. Brites
Description:
M. L. Brites was found dead on Sunday 22nd July 2018 in an umbanda temple on 200 Olegario Andrade, Pilar Centro. She had been dead for at least four days.

The cause of her death was not reported.

Note that the TGEU TDoR 2018 list gives her name as Julia Ponce.

She was 38. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR

Name: Paola Villefort
Description:
Paola was found stabbed to death late on the morning of Monday 23rd July 2018 in the village of Capivari dos Eleotérios, which links Araújos to Nova Serrana, Minas Gerais.

Paola lived in Patrocínio and had taken part in the local Pride event there on 15th July. Her Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/paola.drumon.7.

Name: Alaska Bout
Description:
Alaska was found half naked and dead on the banks of the River Bobos with barbed wire around her neck. Her body showed signs of torture.

Alaska was the current winner of the Nuestra Belleza Gay title in Martínez de la Torre. She was the second trans beauty queen killed in Mexico in 2018, following [Yamileth Quintero](https://tdor.translivesmatter.info/reports/2018/05/24/yamileth-quintero_culiacan-sinaloa-mexico_a298098b ) in May.

Her Facebook account is https://www.facebook.com/alaska.bout.5.

Name: Daiane Souza
Description:
Daiane was shot dead in the Restinga neighborhood on the night of Wednesday 25th July.

According to witnesses, an intense firefight took place at around  11pm on Silvio Sirângelo street. Upon arriving at the scene police found the victim dead from gunshot wounds.

IBTE & Porto Alegre 24 horas, 26.07.2018

Name: Gaby Arantes
Description:
Gaby was robbed and beaten to death with an iron bar by a client who refused to pay her.

His photo was circulated on Facebook. Police are asking for information which may lead to the arrest of the suspect.

> This coward stole the money she had worked and killed her with a stick and iron bar, because he was known and knew that she. I would tell, Gaby was a very quiet person who knows knows, she is no one deserves a tragic death of this

Gaby's Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100010316865789.

IBTE & Facebook . Fórum de Travestis e Transexuais do Rio de  Janeiro, 27.07.2018

Name: Louise
Description:
Louise was a student who died by suicide. No other details are known.

According to the report below her teacher wrote this about her:

> "A wonderful human being, the most intense look I've ever known.
> An infectious smile.
> A light soul.
> But her pains were greater than we could suppose."

https://homofobiamata.wordpress.com/2018/07/26/230-louise/

Name: Dalila de Oliveira
Description:
Dalila died by hanging with a sheet in a prison bathroom. She was a Brazilian sex worker who had only just arrived in the prison after being arrested for robbery.

Dalila de Oliveira died in custody in Udine, Friuli Venezia Giulia (Italy) on 31 Jul 2018. She was a Brazilian sex worker who had only just arrived in the prison.

She was 33. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR
